slide2.text1: Drones and bases to protect terrains
slide2.text2: Paired with solar panels and AI

slide3.text2: Help the client in risk decisions

about.1: NerFire is a fire prevention solution.
about.2: Drones protecting forest areas and charging bases with reliable communication. Our service offers artificial intelligence and simulation of the covered area in order to conserve green spaces.

droneInfo.1: Use of UHF for communication between drones;
droneInfo.2: Drone flights up to 120 meters, according to ANAC (Portuguese National Aviation Authority);
droneInfo.3: Patrols limited to the drone's autonomy during bad weather and night.

base.mark: Bases strategically positioned according to drone autonomy
